content.query:
IF OBJECT_ID('dwh.trip_data_green_agg_copy') IS NOT NULL 
	DROP TABLE dwh.trip_data_green_agg_copy
GO
CREATE TABLE dwh.trip_data_green_agg_copy
	(
	 [pu_location_id] bigint,
	 [do_location_id] bigint,
	 [total_trip_count] bigint,
	 [total_fare_amount] float
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)
GO

--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestrationâ€‹
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_trip_data_green_agg_copy
--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO dwh.trip_data_green_agg_copy
(pu_location_id 1, do_location_id 2, total_trip_count 3, total_fare_amount 4)
FROM 'https://syanpsecoursedlblaise.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/gold/trip_data_green_agg'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'PARQUET'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
	,COMPRESSION = 'snappy'
)
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dwh.trip_data_green_agg_copy
GO
